body:
Ranks are required to buy multiple trails, badges and gadgets?

This is bs. As a server, you are just asking for more people to donate, and I can assure you this is not going to happen.

Can't everything be attainable for everyone? Say if you have saved 100k for the Omega badge, only to find you can't get it because you have not donated.

If there's ONE thing that could improve this update, scrap that idea, it's pointless and biased.

Myv.
body_tagged:

This is bs. As a server, you are just asking for more people to donate, and I can assure you this is not going to happen.

Can't everything be attainable for everyone? Say if you have saved 100k for the Omega badge, only to find you can't get it because you have not donated.

If there's ONE thing that could improve this update, scrap that idea, it's pointless and biased.

Myv.
